attributes.action: Allow Food Delivery personell to park anywhere when picking up food
attributes.additional_details: I am an Uber Eats driver and there's literally nowhere to park without getting a ticket unless it's in a paid parking space and I pay for parking while there. I shouldn't have to pay £2-£5 for a 3 minutes stay. I then have to walk a couple hundred feet to and from the restaurant, this shedding time off my delivery time and causing me to have low payments and less tips
attributes.background: Designate areas outside certain restaurants and establishments so that Uber Eats and Deliveroo & Just Eat drivers can pick up without being slapped with a parking ticket for leaving their car for less than 10 mins. Or have parking attendants to just leave us alone

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about parking restrictions are a matter for individual local authorities and private land owners, not the Government or House of Commons. As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.
